welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Urena, Venezuela! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city known for its vibrant culture and friendly locals. We invite you to explore all that Urena has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Camilo Dazo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Camilo Dazo Airport handles all cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Antonio Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at San Antonio Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password or payment for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Fria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
